l1menu.description: File for use with the L1Trigger/MenuGeneration CMSSW package version 1: Initial Definitions of triggers versions 1.1: Change Muon Quality Cut to 4
l1menu.TriggerMenu:
I haven't implemented most of these triggers yet, so for now comment them while I test other code <!-- Single Lepton Triggers --> <Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.1"> <name>L1_SingleEG</name> <!-- based on L1_SingleEG22 --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="threshold1">22</parameter> <parameter name="regionCut">4.5</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.1"> <name>L1_SingleIsoEG</name> <!-- based on L1_SingleIsoEG18er --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="threshold1">18</parameter> <parameter name="regionCut">4.5</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVerion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.1"> <name>L1_SingleMu</name> <!-- based on L1_SingleMu16er --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="threshold1">16</parameter> <parameter name="etaCut">2.1</parameter> <parameter name="muonQuality">4</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.1"> <name>L1_SingleTau</name> <!-- no comparable trigger in 2012, based on TDR --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="threshold1">50</parameter> <parameter name="regionCut">4.5</parameter> </Trigger>
<!-- diLepton Triggers -->
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.08"> <name>L1_isoEG_EG</name> <!-- based on L1_DoubleEG_13_7 (Note no isolation) --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="leg1threshold1">13.</parameter> <parameter name="leg2threshold1">7.</parameter> <parameter name="regionCut">4.5</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.08"> <name>L1_DoubleMu</name> <!-- based on L1_DoubleMu_10_3p5 --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="threshold1">10.</parameter> <parameter name="threshold2">3.5</parameter> <parameter name="muonQuality">4</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.08"> <name>L1_isoTau_Tau</name> <!-- no comparable trigger in 2012, based on TDR --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="leg1threshold1">23.</parameter> <parameter name="leg2threshold1">23.</parameter> <parameter name="regionCut">4.5</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.08"> <name>L1_isoEG_Mu</name> <!-- based on L1_Mu3p5_EG12 (note not isolation) --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="leg1threshold1">12.</parameter> <parameter name="leg2threshold1">3.5</parameter> <parameter name="leg1regionCut">4.5</parameter> <parameter name="leg2etaCut">2.172</parameter> <parameter name="leg2muonQuality">4</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.08"> <name>L1_isoEG_Tau</name> <!-- no comparable trigger in 2012, based on TDR --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="leg1threshold1">12.</parameter> <parameter name="leg2threshold1">24.</parameter> <parameter name="leg1regionCut">4.5</parameter> <parameter name="leg2regionCut">4.5</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.08"> <name>L1_isoMu_Tau</name> <!-- no comparable trigger in 2012, based on TDR but rate with current tau alg. is high, so raise tau to threshold used for isoEG_Tau above. --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="leg1threshold1">7.</parameter> <parameter name="leg2threshold1">24.</parameter> <parameter name="leg2regionCut">4.5</parameter> <parameter name="leg1etaCut">2.172</parameter> <parameter name="leg1muonQuality">4</parameter> </Trigger>
<!-- Hadronic Triggers -->
L1_SingleJetC
0 128.
4.5
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.05"> <name>L1_DoubleJet</name> <!-- based on 6 L1_DoubleJetC56 --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="threshold1">56.</parameter> <parameter name="threshold2">56.</parameter> <parameter name="regionCut">4.5</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.05"> <name>L1_QuadJetC</name> <!-- based on L1_QuadJetC36 --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="threshold1">36.</parameter> <parameter name="threshold2">36.</parameter> <parameter name="threshold3">36.</parameter> <parameter name="threshold4">36.</parameter> <parameter name="regionCut">4.5</parameter> </Trigger>
<!-- Cross Triggers -->
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.1"> <name>L1_SingleIsoEG_CJet</name> <!-- No comparable trigger in 2012..use TDR --> <version>1</version> <parameter name="leg1threshold1">14</parameter> <parameter name="leg1regionCut">4.5</parameter> <parameter name="leg2threshold1">46</parameter> <parameter name="leg2regionCut">4.5</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.1"> <name>L1_SingleIsoEG_HTM</name> <!-- based on L1_IsoEG12er_ETM36 --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="leg1threshold1">12.</parameter> <parameter name="leg1regionCut">4.5</parameter> <parameter name="leg2threshold1">36.</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVerion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.1"> <name>L1_SingleMu_CJet</name> <!-- No comparable unprescaled trigger in 2012..use TDR --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="leg1threshold1">10</parameter> <parameter name="leg1etaCut">2.1</parameter> <parameter name="leg2threshold1">36</parameter> <parameter name="leg2regionCut">4.5</parameter> <parameter name="leg1muonQuality">4</parameter> </Trigger>
<Trigger formatVerion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.1"> <name>L1_SingleMu_HTM</name> <!-- based on L1_Mu12er_ETM20. --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="leg1threshold1">12.</parameter> <parameter name="leg1etaCut">2.1</parameter> <parameter name="leg2threshold1">20</parameter> <parameter name="leg1muonQuality">4</parameter> </Trigger>
<!-- Eneergy Sum Triggers --> <Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.05"> <name>L1_HTT</name> <!-- based on L1_HTT125 No chance move to 287 as in TDR --> <version>0</version> <parameter name="threshold1">287.</parameter> </Trigger>
<!-- <Trigger formatVersion="0" fractionOfTotalBandwidth="0.05"> <name>L1_HTM</name> <!-- based on L1_ETM36 (Note this is ETM..no HTM trigger in 2012... This does not seem viable...so drop <version>0</version> <parameter name="threshold1">36.</parameter> </Trigger> -->
